ARABIC: فَٱسْتَجَابَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ فَصَرَفَ عَنْهُ كَيْدَهُنَّ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: His Lord replied to him and turned away from him their female guile and deviousness. He is the One Who Hears, the One Who Knows.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: His Lord heard his prayer, and averted the women's wiles from him. He verily hears and knows everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon his Lord granted his prayer, and averted their guile from him. Surely He alone is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: His Lord heard his prayers and protected him from their guile; He is All-hearing and All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So his Lord heard his prayer and repelled the women’s deceit away from him; indeed He only is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So his Lord answered his invocation and turned away from him their plot. Verily, He is the All-Hearer, the All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thereupon his Lord accepted his prayer and turned away their guile from him; surely He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So his Lord answered him, and He turned away from him their guile; surely He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So his Lord heard his prayer and fended off their wiles from him. Lo! He is Hearer, Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So his Lord answered him and warded off their guile. He is All Hearing and All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then his Lord answered to him, and averted their guile from him; verily He! He is the Hearer, the Knower!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So his Lord answered him and turned away their stratagems from him. Indeed, He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So his Lord hearkened to him (in his prayer), and turned away from him their snare: Verily He heareth and knoweth (all things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So his Lord answered his invocation and turned away from him their plot. Verily, He is the All-Hearer, the All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: His Lord answered him and He turned their guile away from him. Indeed, He is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thereupon his Lord answered him, and diverted their scheming away from him. He is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So his Lord responded to him and averted from him their plan. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:34] So his Lord answered him, his supplication, and He fended off their wiles from him. Truly He is the Hearer, of words, the Knower, of deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So his Lord heard his prayer and fended off their wiles from him. Lo! He is Hearer) of prayers, (Knower) of His answer; it is also said Hearer of the ladies' talk and Knower of their scheming.
